channel.title: Comments on: Charmed Life
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: The Hellmouth is opening up by the laundramat? How odd...but I am very thankful you had good timing...And of course you have a charmed life, my dear. You've got places to go, things to do...;)
item.content:encoded: The Hellmouth is opening up by the laundramat? How odd…but I am very thankful you had good timing…And of course you have a charmed life, my dear. You’ve got places to go, things to do…;)
